column1: 1;The threat actor can come into contact with the asset only if resources are expended to generate a tailored method of making contact.
2;The threat actor can come into contact with the asset with no tailored methods if specifically targeting the asset.
3;The threat actor can come into contact with the asset with no tailored methods if generically targeting that asset type.
4;The threat actor can come into contact with the asset with no tailored methods if generically targeting that industry.
5;The threat actor can come into contact with the asset randomly and with no targeted intent.
